---
id: post-api-staff-reset-instance
title: "Reset instance"
description: "This endpoint resets the entire instance by deleting all servers, clearing required collections, and reinitializing test collections. Only accessible to users with ADMIN rank."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Reset instance"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/staff/resetInstance/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint resets the entire instance by deleting all servers, clearing required collections, and reinitializing test collections. Only accessible to users with ADMIN rank.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
  
</StatusCodes>
